thread.title: Sondra Coble

author: Sondra Coble
title: Sondra Coble
text: I have no issues with Nutrisystem company. The only thing so far, I would like for the chat people to be able to address my issues instead of referring me to a phone number. The shelf stable food is mostly good and the frozen food is great. This is only my second month so I haven't been on the program long enough to have had any major issues. The food is good and the plan works, that's the main thing. I recommend it to anyone who needs structure in an eating plan.
